attributes.title: DO NOT RECOMMEND!!!!
attributes.review: This app literally took days to download not even kidding and when it did download it crashed right as I opened it I restarted it to see if it was my phone well it wasn’t it was the app it kept crashing and freezing also the ✨orange✨ should continue this app so it can keep freezing and crashing so people will leave a bad review it’s a horrible app doesn’t do wonders     hOPefuLLY THIs WoNT gET TaKEN DowN

attributes.title: NEVER AGAIN 😑
attributes.review: I wish I could rate this app 0 stars. It’s terrible just terrible. I’ve never HATED an app as much as I hate this one. My phone is just as traumatized as I am by this app, and that’s saying something. Never again will I think to download this app to support my totally not homophobic and racist president. I hated it there. As I said terrible it’s just terrible. Do not waste a bit of your time to download this app. It is not worth it.

attributes.title: DO NOT GET THIS APP!!!!!
attributes.review: First , i got this app and it took forever to load , and my apps never take long to load so i knew this app had some bad stinky juju. Next IT STARTED LAGGING!!! My wholeeee phone just started lagging a bunch. I don't think this app have been updated! Please DO NOT use this app because hackers are going around using your phone number for gang related stuff!Just don't🤢.Im in such a risk writing this , but yeah. Stay safe and don't use this app❤️😹.

attributes.title: i am appalled
attributes.review: HEADLINE: “Frisbee Hits Hive: Internet Down. Bee-stander: “I heard a sound, and next thing I knew...wham-o!.” Barry drives up, stops in front of Adam. Adam jumps in. BARRY Hey, Adam. ADAM Hey, Barry. (pointing at Barry’s hair) Is that fuzz gel? BARRY A little. It’s a special day. Finally graduating. ADAM I never thought I’d make it. BARRY Yeah, three days of grade school, three days of high school. ADAM Those were so awkward. BARRY Three days of college. I’m glad I took off one day in the middle and just hitchhiked around the hive. ADAM You did come back different.

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER😾!!
attributes.review: Firstly, I would like to say that this app took 3 hours to download, when I have at least 40 extra gb of memory left on my phone. Secondly, I think this app has downloaded some kind of spyware or something on my phone because I can see my screen recording button is on, when I haven’t even touch it. Lastly, this app is just horrible overall, and MUST be removed from the app store!!

attributes.title: Virus
attributes.review: As soon as I downloaded the app my phone crashed. Thinking nothing of it at the time I opened the app and then my phone crashed again. Only this time it wiped all of my data.  Luckily I had done a backup recently but now my phone still crashes from time to time even after I try restarting it. I even tried deleting the app but my phone still has this virus on it.

attributes.title: this ruined my life✨🥺🥺💕🧚‍♀️
attributes.review: This app took 73 hours and 42 minutes to download. When I opened it my phone ELECTROCUTED me. I was in my uncles pool and I dropped the phone. My uncle swam down to pick it up but then he started getting shocked and everything went down hill. He finally picked it up and through it out of the pool but then his DOG got it. The dog chewed it and fell to the floor shaking and puking. I’m writing this review sitting on a rock in the woods where we are burying the dog. R.I.P Betsy.

attributes.title: HORRIBLE!
attributes.review: This is app is absolutely horrible. I downloaded it to see if it could change my perspective on the president and then i realized all presidents matter but that’s besides the point. When i got this app that same night i was possessed and had awful sleep paralysis. My toes were cut off and i had to watch it happen. Traumatizing experience will be deleting this app shortly since it stole all my data as well.

attributes.title: DONT GET THIS APP
attributes.review: Hello,if your wonder from the tittle of this review,well let me explain,when i went into the app it told me to put my phone number in and i did,of course,BUT when i did all of my apps refreshed! AH ,my messages were gone,my apps were gone,literally everything was gone! Expect for the Trump app 2020. i had to redownload everything and sign in again,Thanks alot App :) Thank you for your time 🙂 have a good day!

attributes.title: I am disgusted honey I was in tears almost
attributes.review: 🧚🏿🏳️‍🌈💕This app is horrible it down 78 weeks to download when I finally opened the app this orange ompa lompa popped up on the screen it was the scariest thing I have ever screen anyways Chile black lives matter sorry phone glitched👀 PRO CHOICE-TRUMP IS A RACIST AND RAPIST once I closed the app I heard a knock on my door I opened the door and saw bearon Trump was standing outside my house in the rain asking me to save him from his home at the white house💕🏳️‍🌈🧚🏿
